title: Did the Boy Scouts of America Implement a New Policy Requiring Condoms to Be Available at Jamboree?
subtitle: The policy has been in place for years and is not connected to BSA's decision to include girls.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: The Boy Scouts implemented a new policy requiring condoms to be available at its quadrennial World Scout Jamboree, shortly after announcing that girls would be able to join the organization.
